From:

Subject: SDNY Trial Subpoena 
Date: Tue, 13 Jul 2021 20:04:19 +0000 
Attachments: 
2021.07.13_Court_Subpoena_-I 
SANYS 
It 
alY) (FBI)" 
Sergeant 
Thank you so much for meeting with us by video-conference today. As discussed, attached please find a trial subpoena 
for the case in SONY. We will reach back out in early November 2021 to prep via video. At that point, we will be able to 
give you a better estimate of when you will likely be called to testify, and we can make arrangements for your travel and 
hotel for trial. 
In the meantime, please feel free to reach out if you have any questions or if any issues come up. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00019871
